name: Lilliputian Modifications
description: Grimm & Sons Engineering is not responsible for basically anything going wrong if you chose to make your mech super tiny. You signed the waiver. You literally can’t sue or we’ll revoke your license.
effect: You may reduce mech's size by 1, to a minimum of 1/2. A size 1/2 mech that takes this modification may fit through most doors. Additionally Overwatch attacks against you are made at +1 Difficulty.
